page_not_found_desc: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
access_denied_desc: You do not have permission to access this page. Please contact the administrator if you believe this is an error.
server_error_desc: An unexpected server error occurred. We are working to fix the issue. Please try again later.
general_desc: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
session_expired_desc: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.
network_error_desc: Unable to connect to server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
validation_failed_desc: Some information you entered is not in the correct format. Please check and try again.
file_upload_error_desc: Unable to upload file. Please check file format and size.
database_error_desc: Unable to access data. Please try again later.
quota_exceeded_desc: You have exceeded the usage limit. Please contact the administrator.
maintenance_desc: The system is under maintenance. Please come back later.
test_not_found_desc: The test you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.
quiz_not_found_desc: The quiz you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted.
unauthorized_access_desc: You do not have permission to perform this action.
invalid_request_desc: Your request is not in the correct format or missing required information.
